About J & K Police Constable:

J & K Police Constable exam is conducted offline by the Jammu & Kashmir Police Department to select eligible candidates for the posts of Constables. J & K Police Constable is one of the most coveted jobs in the Government sector and comes with a lot of perks. This app helps you to prepare for the J & K Police Constable Exam by providing the best online test series. You can practice mock tests of J & K Police Constable online and achieve success.

Subjects Covered in J & K Police Constable:

General Awareness/General Knowledge - Current Affairs, History, Geography, Economy, Politics, Important National & International Events and Seminars, Socio-Economic and Cultural Background of Jammu & Kashmir, etc.

Elementary Mathematics - Fractions and Decimals, Estimating, LCM & HCF, Number Sense & Numeration, Ratio and Proportions, Rational Numbers, Analytical Geometry, Exponents and Radicals, etc.

Analytical Aptitude and Ability - Logical Reasoning, Verbal Reasoning, Non-Verbal Reasoning, Analytical Reasoning, Mirror Images, Data Sufficiency, Coding-Decoding, Blood Relations, Analogy, etc.

Special Features of EduGorilla’s J & K Police Constable Test Series:

creator: EduGorilla Testseries 9
descriptionHtml:
A Constable's post is often on par with the post of an Officer in the Indian Police Force. They are responsible for presiding over the day to day activities of their station. Jammu and Kashmir Police (JKP) Force, established in 1873, is the law enforcement agency responsible for upholding the Law and Order in the state of J & K. Jammu and Kashmir Police department has recently released notification for recruitment of constables in the Force.

Special Features 🤩 of EduGorilla's J & K Police Constable Mock Tests
👉 Accessible 💻 24*7 from any & all devices
👉 Latest pattern Mock Tests 📖 & Current Affairs 📖 present in J & K Police Constable Practice Exam App
👉 Mock Tests ⏳ with questions as per the latest exam pattern
👉 Smart user-interface that saves 40% of study time ⏱️
👉 Daily News 📖 provided for the latest issues
👉 Relevant Current Affairs 📖 for the exams
👉 Reminders for Regular Exam Updates 📖
👉 Daily Quiz ⏳ to test your preparation
👉 Detailed analysis 💡 and performance comparison 🤟 on All-India & State-Level basis
👉 Accessible in Hindi, Gujrati Kannada & English Language ✍️
👉 The best online exam preparation app available at modest price 🤩

J & K Police Constable App Details
To ensure that only the best candidates are appointed as personnel, the recruitment process for J & k Police Constable is kept highly competitive requiring absolute focus of the aspirants. This is where EduGorilla’s online learning apps and online test series come in handy. J & K Police Constable mock test app and J & K Police Constable practice exam app covers all important topics constituting the exam syllabus. The J & K Police Constable exam preparation app fastens the pace of aspirants’ exam preparation, saving their study time upto 40%. EduGorilla’s preparation app clears concepts and provides aspirants the opportunity to practice and sharpen their skills.

Subjects Covered in J & K Police Constable
👉 General Awareness: Basic GK, Indian History, Geography, Environment, Indian Economy, Indian Politics, Basic Computer, etc.
👉 General Knowledge: Sports, Heritage, General Science, Geography, Indian Parliament, Literature, Inventions & Discoveries, Famous Days and Dates, etc.
👉 Reasoning: Puzzles, Verbal & Non-Verbal Reasoning, Cause and Effect, Logical Problems, etc.
👉 Analytical Aptitude & Ability: Pipes and Cisterns, Partnership, Volume and Surface Area, Square Roots.
👉 Mathematics Number System, HCF LCM, Percentages, Ratios, Averages, Simple & Compound Interest, Profit & Loss, Time Speed & Distance, Time & Work, etc.

J & K Police Constable Exam Pattern
👉 Mode of Exam: Offline
👉 Duration: 120 Minutes
👉 No. of Questions: 100
👉 Total Marks: 100

We provide the best exam preparation apps at a modest price to help all students in preparation for various exams. EduGorilla’s best online exam preparation apps provide keen insight into the latest exam pattern. Therefore, get our apps today to get the best mock tests.

Start preparing today on EduGorilla: India’s Best Mock Test App.

descriptionHtml:
A Constable's post is often on par with the post of an Officer in the Indian Police Force. They are responsible for presiding over the day to day activities of their station. Jammu and Kashmir Police (JKP) Force, established in 1873, is the law enforcement agency responsible for upholding the Law and Order in the state of J & K. Jammu and Kashmir Police department has recently released notification for recruitment of constables in the Force.

Special Features 🤩 of EduGorilla's J & K Police Constable Mock Tests
👉 Accessible 💻 24*7 from any & all devices
👉 Latest pattern Mock Tests 📖 & Current Affairs 📖 present in J & K Police Constable Practice Exam App

👉 Accessible in Hindi, Gujrati Kannada & English Language ✍️
👉 The best online exam preparation app available at modest price 🤩

J & K Police Constable App Details
To ensure that only the best candidates are appointed as personnel, the recruitment process for J & k Police Constable is kept highly competitive requiring absolute focus of the aspirants. This is where EduGorilla’s online learning apps and online test series come in handy. J & K Police Constable mock test app and J & K Police Constable practice exam app covers all important topics constituting the exam syllabus. The J & K Police Constable exam preparation app fastens the pace of aspirants’ exam preparation, saving their study time upto 40%. EduGorilla’s preparation app clears concepts and provides aspirants the opportunity to practice and sharpen their skills.

Subjects Covered in J & K Police Constable
👉 General Awareness: Basic GK, Indian History, Geography, Environment, Indian Economy, Indian Politics, Basic Computer, etc.
👉 General Knowledge: Sports, Heritage, General Science, Geography, Indian Parliament, Literature, Inventions & Discoveries, Famous Days and Dates, etc.
👉 Reasoning: Puzzles, Verbal & Non-Verbal Reasoning, Cause and Effect, Logical Problems, etc.
👉 Analytical Aptitude & Ability: Pipes and Cisterns, Partnership, Volume and Surface Area, Square Roots.
👉 Mathematics Number System, HCF LCM, Percentages, Ratios, Averages, Simple & Compound Interest, Profit & Loss, Time Speed & Distance, Time & Work, etc.

J & K Police Constable Exam Pattern
👉 Mode of Exam: Offline
👉 Duration: 120 Minutes
👉 No. of Questions: 100
👉 Total Marks: 100
